en.join: Why would you like to join?
en.confirm: Confirm your country code and enter
en.tap: Tap nex to get an sms confirmation
en.review: We will review your application and notify you of our decision within the next week.
en.club: If you are accepted into the club, we will provide more information on the next steps and our upcoming meetings and events schedule. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us at
en.thankyou: Thank you for your interest in the Livingroom membership.
en.reserve: Reserve a Living Room for your next meeting
en.private: Our private living rooms are infused with art and culture, and activated by extraordinary culinary experiences
en.pleasure: What a pleasure to see you again?
en.feel: Feel Paris and enjoy combined comfortable and casual elegance.
en.offer: Each living-room offers a unique background with a distinctive style, allowing members to find the perfect environment for any private meeting.
en.importantDetails: Here are a few important details to note before booking your conference room:
en.cancel: You may cancel or change the date of your reservation 24 hours prior to your booking start time
en.reserved: The meeting rooms can be reserved Sunday - Thursday between 9 am granted 15 minutes prior to the start time of your reservation.
en.meetingHost: As a meeting host, you are responsible for welcoming your guests and bringing them into the conference room.
en.throw: Please throw away trash and tidy uo the conference room as you have received it, so it’s ready for the next guest to use.
en.titleForYourMeeting: Please write a title for your meeting
en.titleAppear: The title will appear on your guests’ invitations.
en.click: Click here to change payment methods
en.priceILS: The price is in ILS and includes VAT.
en.fillInTheGuest: Please fill in the guest details bellow
en._fillInTheGuest: Please fill in the guest details
en.emailOrderDetails: An email with the order details was send to:
en.fillGaps: Fill in the fields or use camera phone.
en.marketingTeam: to the Marketing Team meeting of Cyberfuze
en.getReady: Get ready for a fun-filled weekend at our business club party! This is your chance to unwind and let loose with your fellow professionals. The party will feature a variety of activities, delicious food    and drinks, and great music to keep you entertained all might long. Meet new people make valuable    connections, and let your hair down in a relaxed and casual setting.
en.notBeMissed: This is an event not to be missed, so gather your friends and colleagues and join us for a weekend of networking and celebration.
en.dressCode: Dress code is casual attire. RSVP now to secure your sport!
en.planToCome: Plan to come to the party
en.upcomingWeekendParty: Thank you for your purchase for the upcoming weekend party.
en.orderReceived: Your order has been received and is currently awaiting approval.
en.confirmation: We will send you a confirmation or rejection message via SMS once your payment has been processed.
en.letYouKnow: Just to let you know, a change will only be made once your order has been approved.
en.choosingYourService: Thank you for choosing our service, and we look forward to hosting you for a memorable weekend party.
en.copiesOfOriginalTicket: Copies of the original ticket won’t be accepted.
en.transferring: Transferring or reselling this ticket constitutes a violation of the Terms of Use.
en.contactUsToChange: Contact us to change or cancel you order
en.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
en.deletePermanently: The account will be deleted permanently.
